content:
create a witty haiku to the title of "is this thing on" mimicing a mic tap before talking
Tap tap—hello, world?
Echo dances in silence—
Words wait in the wings.
Photo by copilot. [Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0 International License](http://creativecommons.org/licenses
title: Is this thing on?
